attributes.action: Declare the current UK Government Bankrupt
attributes.additional_details:
Considering fiat currency isn't backed by anything of value the government can but choose not to write itself a cheque to payoff all the national debt. Thus saving the interest payment it could use to pay itself back. 

The government should consider bankruptcy as the only option to clear its debt and to reinstate proper spending to public services immediately. 

Crime is out of control, the NHS is at breaking point, local councils can't keep up with road maintenance. The country is a insolvent.
attributes.background: As the uk government can no longer meet its financial obligations to the NHS, Schools, Fire Service, Police to name a few under uk legislation any other company would be prosecuted for trading insolvent. The government should consider bankruptcy to stop the overwhelming interest payments it makes.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
